1.title: Meet the 5 Seconds of Summer Boys
1.plot: Though theyre one of the hottest rising rock bands in the world, 5 Seconds of Summer are also just regular (hilarious) guys. See for yourself backstage on their tour with One Direction.

2.title: On Tour with 5 Seconds of Summer
2.plot: The 5 Seconds of Summer guys go backstage at the Stade de France where theyre on tour with One Direction. Learn how the Australian band skyrocketed to fame and about their relationship with their fans.

3.title: 5 Seconds of Summer on Dating, Crying, and Posting Selfies
3.plot: The gentlemen of 5 Seconds of Summer answer the questions youve been dying to ask: Do they have girlfriends? Are they seeing anyone?

4.title: 5 Pre-Show Rituals for 5 Seconds of Summer
4.plot: To get into the right mind-set for playing to a sold-out stadium of fans, the 5 Seconds of Summer boys follow a few traditions before going onstage. Find out the five things they do to get psyched and energized for their big gigs.

5.title: An Exclusive Look at What It's Like to Go on Tour with Austin Mahone
5.plot: Take a peek inside the adventures of Austin Mahone and his crew of friends (self-dubbed "The Foolish Four") as they tour the country and try to keep their lives as normal as possible.

6.title: Austin Mahone Backstage Before His Sold-Out Concert in Phoenix
6.plot: Go on tour with Austin Mahone as he makes a stop in Phoenix, Arizona, for a major show. Starting the day with a photo shoot, Austin spends the rest of his time personally connecting with fans before the big night.

7.title: Go Inside Austin Mahone's Massive Tour Bus
7.plot: See where Austin Mahone and his pals rest their heads at night in this exclusive peek inside Austins tour bus. His pals show you where they live, eat, talk about girls, and write music_all while traveling the country on a sold-out concert tour.

8.title: Austin Mahone's 5 Surprising Pre-Show Rituals
8.plot: Before playing a sold-out concert, there are a few things Austin Mahone must do to warm up and get in the right mind-set. Can you guess what they are?

9.title: Go Backstage with Meghan Trainor on Her First World Tour
9.plot: Take a sneak peek at Meghan Trainor backstage before her first-ever world tour.

10.title: Meghan Trainor Reveals the Craziest Thing That's Ever Happened to Her on Stage
10.plot: Go backstage with Meghan Trainor as she shows you how she gets ready before a show and what its like to be onstage for her first headlining tour.

11.title: Watch This Special Moment Between Meghan Trainor and Her Fans
11.plot: Before every show, Meghan Trainor takes an hour to meet with a few of her devoted concertgoers. Get a glimpse of the memorable time she shares with them before her big show in NYC.

12.title: Go Backstage with Demi Lovato on Her World Tour
12.plot: Hear what Demi Lovato has to say about her biggest inspiration, and meet the people she brings with her in this exclusive look at her pre-show routine backstage before one of her world tour concert performances.

13.title: Demi Lovato's Dream All-Female Music Group
13.plot: Backstage on her world tour, Demi Lovato reveals who her musical idols are and dreams up her ultimate all-female pop vocal group.

14.title: Demi Lovato's Final Thoughts Before She Steps on Stage
14.plot: Go backstage with Demi Lovato on her world tour. See what she does for fun in her free time, and hear what her last thoughts are before she walks onstage to perform.

15.title: Go on Tour with Charli XCX
15.plot: Learn who inspires Charli XCX, how she relaxes her tongue, and the kinds of gifts that fans give her. Plus, catch a look at her show in Prague where shes on tour with Katy Perry.

16.title: Charli XCX on What It's Like to Tour with Katy Perry
16.plot: See Charli XCX unfiltered backstage before her concert in Prague. Find out how she writes her music, what her favorite fan gift is, and what its like to tour with Katy Perry.

17.title: Charli XCX on Her Pre-Show Rituals
17.plot: Think that a pop stars life is all glamour? Find out what Charli XCX does to prepare for a big show in Prague. You decide.

18.title: Go Inside Charli XCX's Tour Bus
18.plot: Get an inside look at Charli XCXs tour bus, and see where she relaxes and sleeps. She also talks about some of the weird places where shes performed.

imdb.title: Headliners
plot: Ever wonder what its like to be on tour with a pop star? See for yourself as you go backstage with some of todays hottest musicians, including Charli XCX, Meghan Trainor, Austin Mahone, 5 Seconds of Summer, and Demi Lovato.
